Blog.post: urlLink This is the photo I like most. I am a beginner on photography but this shot makes me feel like a pro. This is the swimming pool at Inti College. Somebody, give me any photography award!!!~~~ Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Pretty scene taken at Melati Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink My housemates and I used to climb up this hill. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Nice bridge. No more hot sun, heavy rain threat. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Inti College's coach. Normally its not an easy task to get in this coach. But usually I can get in there easily. There is a very secret tactic to do so, the name of the tactic is 'Jump Q' Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This posture is a standard post for model introducing beautiful car in a showroom. She is introducing how nice the grass are. The bricks too. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Jessica in a perfect view. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Here we can see the hostels, guard house to restrict cars' access; and bustop. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This is the one I take after using the toilet. So its a view outside toilet of the main building. Smell anything? :P Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Me standing under the bridge from Lab to the main building. I am not a photogenic, I don't used to show my teeth in photo. So although I showed this time, its pretty fake. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Another view of the basketball court of Melati. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The road to Wembley...Nah...The road to Inti College from Melati. At night, the street lamp always off. So its very danger if you walk around here. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This is clearer shot with flash. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Block A view. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Jessica in front of the Inti College Main Entrance. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Jessica at the garden. The plant behind is called 'Pink flower tree', hehe just bullshit abit. :P Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The playground right beside the basketball court at Melati. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink View from road to the basketball court. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Front view of the main building. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Basketball court at Melati, my housemates like Keng Gee, Chih Yuen and Jason used to play here. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink A top view from main building. The blue roof is for the pedestrian bridge, the time i come this bulk still not built. See the Inti sign on the opposite of the building? I used to screwed off one of the letter "I", making the sign looks "Int" the next day, the staff fixed this up very quicky. Thereafter, the security to go there is much more strict. Opps. There is a good place to feel the cool wind. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink One of the basketball court in Inti College. At night, many lover birds hang around here. The building is girl's hostel. I hav a coursemate lived here before, her name is Angeline. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The road taken inside car. This is at Melati. Those who live or lived here must know this scene. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Learning Resource Centre, I don't have much chance to use the facilities in this building, anyway the new library in this building is superb. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Everytime I arrive for class, I never miss to buy Ice Lemon Tea from this vending machine. I feels that it must have some extra 'thing' in the drinks, I feel very addicted to it. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Here is Jessica at the garden. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A far view of Inti College, the photo is not very clear because its taken inside the car. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The Dress Code!!! Well its clearly stated what you cannot wear. But for myself, I can always skip the attention of the guards. Just that for library, its very strict. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This is Jessica sitting on the umpire's chair of the basketball court. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This is Fong Huey beside the canteen. Here is a small garden. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink The Finance Office. Every semester, right after I submitted my course fees, I will straight come here to buy car sticker. If missed the chance to buy the bloody sticker, in 4 months later, you will have to park your car under the crazy hot sun. There is a new queue system installed so that peoples can wait for their number rather than standing in a line like a silly worm. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink A view from engineering labs to the silly lift. This lift always stuck, I was victim for about 2 times. Its very normal if you walk by and hear some peoples screaming inside the lift for help. Well, no big deal, keep screaming and shouting, I love that, lol. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Our photo taken in front of Multi Purpose Hall (MPH), not the one which sells books. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The main entrance of School of Engineering and Technology. Its locked because at that time is semester break. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This is Fong Huey in front of the Multi Purpose Hall at Inti College Nilai. She love this one because it looks like she is advertising the Dutch Lady non-fat milk. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Myself in front of the house I rented years ago. House number is PT 10238. The doors of this house usually not locked but never have any steal case happened. 'Phychology lock' are used, musics, lightings, ceiling fans, etc all kept open. Nobody dare to come in eventhough there are few computers, speakers, TV, motorcycles and many valueble things inside. Posted by Stanley Ooi
Boring life earning money without much purposes, or just to buy yourself a nice coffin?

I am very committed to this game. One that I may join WOC (World Othello Championship) in future. I hope my sluggish play can become solid and consistent one day. And yes, I never take it for granted, keep playing and losing and learning.
urlLink Emily and friend. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Let's show them our pretty legs. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Where is guy? Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Group photo. Plus some animals...pig,dogs,bears etc... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Always know which camera to look at. 4 against 1. I Win :-D Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Jessica Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The photogenic gal with Emily Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink come on, faster...i am sweating... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink 2 Sweet gals. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This pic looks so smooth. Every objects in the photo give the best co-operation to make this one a perfect cap. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink I am very happy with my sister. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Emily and her friend. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink We are graduated :-D Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Best Teeth Showing Award goes to.......Emily !!! Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Candidates for Miss Rahman College Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Candidates for Miss Rahman College. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Candidates for Miss Rahman College. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A unique and nice photo I like. Because so many peoples around and nobody look at me. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Her sister has a bulky videocam. Which one to look at? Sure its mine :-D Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Roses are purple, baby's-breath are white. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Sexy guy looking at me, need to run away, so embarrasing... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink I am speechless. Am I attractive? Am I adorable? (thinking in her mind, sure I am, if you dare to say no, will use this flower straight for your funeral. Just kidding~~~ Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Blue color rose. step away you yellow shirt guy/gal, you ruined the photo....:/ Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Ready? Ready? Not at all..... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Flowers and more flowers....But I miss Kenneth's 'round round flower' :/. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Somehow tired now. Smile until my face become frozen..... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Nobody will ever doubt if this photo is for Miss Malaysia 2004. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Emily: How are you now? Replied: I am fine, can you see there are some peoples looking toward us now? Especially the guy in grey shirt, he is somehow cute showing his muscles. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Pretty women, standing down the field~ Pretty women, standing with shinny face.~ Oppss never notice a guy there. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Where are your flowers? I ordered a lorry of flowers, have to give them a call, what the heck they are doing..so slow... (No such scene, I added for humorous purpose.) Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Wow, infact this photo is very clear and nice. Never notice I can take such nice photo. :P everyone can do the same la... Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Hmmm, this gal on the left is almost a pink panther...Opps..well pink lady always looks cute. Anyway Emily still the star over here :-). The other gal hav a nice appearance but surely her smile looks a bit fake. sorry no offense :-) Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Congratulations !!!! Thanks a lot.... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink This photo shows that the white shirt gal in a more shinny mode. She knows how to take the attention. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Emily and ....gosh I forgot her name....sorry but she is photogenic. Nice compliment? :P Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink More exposure for her dad, Emily and her mum. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink I forgot this guy's name but remembered he is a chinese doctor, Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink There are 4 main cast in this photo. From left to right. Emily(Supergirl); the invicible gal; Catwoman; and spiderwoman. I am more into the invicible gal. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A group photo. You will miss that moment. But no worry, photos will hav them in a longer term. Farewell my friends and college. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A graceful day for me Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink We are happy family. Don't you think so too? Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink More exposure so we looks white. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Don't you peoples think she is cute? Look at her tiny eyes, yummy yummy. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink I am so happy, I want to thanks everyone for giving me this flower and a photo taken by a somehow professional photographer :P Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Again me, Jessica, Emily, her mum and dad. Anyway if you don't know, this is taken at Rahman College Student Hall. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The 2nd supporting actress goes to.........the pretty white shirt gal which I don't know her name. Oppsss... Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink I use Morning Kiss every morning. Its full with calcium and I have pretty and solid teeth. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Me, Jessica, Emily, her mum and dad. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The supporting actress goes to ...................... Jessica Ho !!! Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Her friends from church I think. Not so sure but both are charming though. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink The freshly graduated girl. Emily Ho Fong Li !!! Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Her mother Mrs. Ho and herself. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Her father Mr. Ho and Emily. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Emily....you suppose to look on my cam :P. See even Winnie knows I am capturing this one :-D Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink What happen? Are you capturing photo? While I like to take photo in a more nature feel mode. Standing there and prepared everything and say cheese type is not my cup of tea. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Jessica smiling while showing her 2 tiger teeth, Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A very cute bunch of 'bear bear' flower. This catches my eyes, very good for long keep and it is unique. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Her father, Emily herself and her mother. Everyone is happy with her graduation. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink Here is Jessica and Emily. Posted by Stanley Ooi

urlLink Emily and Winnie. From what I know, Winnie is a pretty and famous girl among the pack of friends. Her flowers suppose to be in light purple but the florist somehow bully her, because the flowers never look very beautiful. Anyway, the prettiness of both girls should steal the focus point from the flowers. Posted by Stanley Ooi
urlLink A close look on the pretty gal. Posted by Stanley Ooi
